data.message:
What about what happened in Gaza 2014 !!! Is'nt that more importanat to share than the story of the player who got injured !
Calling for humanity in the video while you hide the most touching events on all human beings ! Hiding all the masacre that israel and its tails were doing in The whole year !
Such silly!

replies.message: Well said Hawraa Aj Rou  I really feel for the people in Gaza ! It drives me insane too hear people complaining about really trivial things such as "oh man when's this bus coming " etc #trivial
Thanks alot ! So glad there still are people thinking like you !

My heart goes out to Israel. A civilized country surrounded by terrorists & people who are taught to hate. If hate filled terrorists would put down their guns there would be peace tomorrow. If Israel were to put down their guns there will be no Israel. Arabs have the most freedom & are safest inside Israel, the only democracy in that region.

Well if you consider the one who come to your land ..steal your house kill your familly and move all your neighbors outside their country under the power of weapons !if you consider that man has the right to own your place after all what he did then there is something wrong in the way of thinking ! No human being  ever would accept this masacre and illegal acts that israel had done to the palestinian people!
